summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1996 for the improvement of Whatcom Avenue, in The City of Seattle, from the north line of the canal water-way to a connection with the existing bridge on Spokane Street, by constructing a pile bridge thereon twenty (20) feet in width, center of bridge to be twenty-six (26) feet east of west margin of the avenue; under Ordinance No. 20401 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
